cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.2)

project(lua5.3)

set(LUA_SRCS
    lapi.c
    lauxlib.c
    lbaselib.c
    lbitlib.c
    lcode.c
    lcorolib.c
    lctype.c
    ldblib.c
    ldebug.c
    ldo.c
    ldump.c
    lfunc.c
    lgc.c
    linit.c
    liolib.c
    llex.c
    lmathlib.c
    lmem.c
    loadlib.c
    lobject.c
    lopcodes.c
    loslib.c
    lparser.c
    lstate.c
    lstring.c
    lstrlib.c
    ltable.c
    ltablib.c
    ltm.c
    lundump.c
    lutf8lib.c
    lvm.c
    lzio.c
)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${LUA_SRCS})
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
